items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: Notification_service was developed as a part of Pepsales.ai intern assignment. The objective was to build a lightweight, queue-based notification service for sending Email, SMS, and In-App messages with auto-retry support using RabbitMQ and Node.js.
items.title: SumandeepSahoo/nofication_service: Notification_service was developed as a part of Pepsales.ai intern assignment. The objective was to build a  lightweight, queue-based notification service for sending Email, SMS, and In-App messages with auto-retry support using RabbitMQ and Node.js.

items.content_html: A lightweight, zero-dependency BSON (Binary JSON) implementation for Node.js. This library provides serialization and deserialization of BSON documents with support for all BSON data types.
items.title: mwarcc/dbson: A lightweight, zero-dependency BSON (Binary JSON) implementation for Node.js. This library provides serialization and deserialization of BSON documents with support for all BSON data types.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.
items.title: orc13a/AmbuStatus: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.

items.content_html: A lightweight file explorer built with Node.js, allowing users to navigate and view server-side directories and files through a web interface. Great for learning about file system access and Express routing in Node.js.
